title: Add tasks for working with file hashes
body:
We've found it useful to have MSBuild tasks for computing and checking file hashes. I'd like to contribute back these tasks to MSBuild. Is this something you would consider taking?

See https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/tree/6bb34082e02ae8a816787d39eb4affc347dad35b/src/Microsoft.DotNet.Build.Tasks.IO#getfilehash and https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/tree/6bb34082e02ae8a816787d39eb4affc347dad35b/src/Microsoft.DotNet.Build.Tasks.IO#verifyfilehash

cc @jeffkl

nodes.body: As long as the new tasks don't require any new assemblies (which they don't appear to), we'd be happy to accept them!
is there any documentation or xsd update on how to use these new tasks from MSBuild?
